co.name: Classical finite element analysis
co.description: The conformance option Classical finite element analysis provides the capability to represent the finite element models, loads, boundary conditions, and analysis results in a manner typical with classical H-version linear static and dynamic analyses.

co.name: Computational fluid dynamics
co.description: The conformance option Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) provides the capability to represent a CFD model and analysis in a manner harmonized with the NASA/AIAA CGNS standard.

co.name: Field defined properties for classical finite element analysis
co.description: The conformance option Field defined properties for classical finite element analysis provides the capability to represent the properties of finite element models and the applied and resulting functional fields with either discrete tables or continuous functions.

co.name: Generic engineering analysis framework
co.description: The conformance option Generic engineering analysis framework provides the capability to represent the properties of finite element models and the applied and resulting functional fields with either discrete tables or continuous functions.

co.name: Generic mesh based numerical analysis
co.description: The conformance option Generic mesh based numerical analysis provides the capability to represent the structured and unstructured mesh models, boundary conditions, and analysis results.
